text.jpText:
やる事なす事破天荒だが、ウマ娘への
愛と情熱はピカイチのちびっこ理事長・秋川。
text.enText:
Akikawa is a little boy who is a maverick in 
everything she does, but her love and passion 
for the Uma Musume is unparalleled.

text.jpText:
そんな彼女から、『URAファイナルズ』の
立役者となってほしい旨を伝えられた。
text.enText:
She told me that she wanted me to play a 
leading role in "URA Finals.

text.jpText:
多くのファンの期待と夢を背負う存在――
“スターウマ娘”に<chrname>を
育て上げること。
text.enText:
To raise <chrname> into a "Star Uma 
Musume," an existence that bears the 
hopes and dreams of many fans. <chrname> 
into a "star horse girl".

text.jpText:
そのために、まずは多くの人々の心を掴み、
ファンを増やさねばならない！
text.enText:
To do this, we must first win the hearts and 
minds of many, and build our fan base!
